ygData.subject: Re: Hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: My motto: Chain/Screech is my friend -=B=- ... From: Dark  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Saturday, October 30, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
My motto: "Chain/Screech is my friend"


-=B=-
-----Original Message-----
From: Dark <dark@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, October 30, 1999 3:56 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hell levels


>From: "Dark" <dark@...>
>
>Hmm if you can solo a hg in your 30's at all then your the
>luckiest bard alive unless you plan on kititng them.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Bard <dabard@...>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>

>Subject: [eqbards] Hell levels
>
>
>>From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>>
>>I keep hearing about 30 being a "hell level" for folks. Bah! My hell
>level
>>is 28. Why? I can't find anything to solo unless it's in a train-filled
>>dungeon :o/ I would do giant skels in Rathe mtns, but they are never
>there.
>>I kill lizards, but only HGs and one-eyes pop up (although I will remeber
>>that fact when I'm in my lower 30's) I've thought about gargoyles in OOT,
>>but have never been there, nor have I any experiance vs. gargoyels (in
this
>>game). Anyone with any ideas on a nice quiet place a level 28 bard can
>solo
>>his way to his lev song?
>>
>>
>>-=B=-
>>28th on The Rathe
